    • checkLocation

      public boolean checkLocation​(int row, int col)
      Checks if the location is a mine.
      Parameters:
      row - - The row of the location to check.
      col - - The col of the location to check.
      Returns:
      true if the location holds a mine.

    • checkAdjBoxes

      public void checkAdjBoxes​(int row, int col)
      Recursively checks surrounding tiles if it has been looked at yet.
      Parameters:
      row - The starting row.
      col - The starting column.

    • calcNumOfMines

      public int calcNumOfMines​(int chosenRow, int chosenCol)
      Checks the surrounding tiles for mines and returns the amount.
      Parameters:
      chosenRow - The row to check.
      chosenCol - The column to check.
      Returns:
      The number of mines surrounding the coordinate.

    • clearBlanks

      public void clearBlanks​(int row, int col)
      Clears the coordinate to a space.
      Parameters:
      row - The row coordinate to change.
      col - The column coordinate to change.

    • setNum

      public void setNum​(int row, int col, int count)
      Changes the hidden coordinate to a value of surrounding mines.
      Parameters:
      row - The row coordinate to change.
      col - The column coordinate to change.
      count - The number to replace the hidden space with.

    • nChecked

      public boolean nChecked​(int row, int col)
      Checks if the space is hidden and returns accordingly.
      Parameters:
      row - The row coordinate to check.
      col - The col coordinate to check.
      Returns:
      True if the space still is hidden.

    • checkWin

      public boolean checkWin()
      Checks if all remaining hidden spaces are mines.
      Returns:
      True if the board is clear and the game is won.
